definitions.body: :Le 7:31 breast of animals (Aram. h.adyo0, [[חַדְיׇא]])—abs. ´[[ח]] Ex 29:26 + 4 t.; cstr. [[חֲוֵה]] Ex 29:27 + 5 t.; pl. [[חָזוֹת]] Le 9:20, Le 9:21—breast, only P, and only of sacrificial animals; always as wave-offering; of ram of installation Ex 29:26, Ex 29:27, Le 8:29, of peace-offering Le 7:30, Le 7:30, Le 9:20, Le 9:21, of Nazirite sacrif. Nu 6:20; perquisite of Aaron and his sons Le 7:31, Le 7:34, Le 10:14, Le 10:15, cf. Nu 18:18.
